articles.title: Trump made big promises and moved at frenetic speed. 100 days in, here's what he's done and not done - AP News
articles.description: The weeks since President Donald Trump returned to office have been a whirlwind of activity to show Americans his administration is relentlessly pursuing his promises. As Trump hits his 100th day in office Tuesday, his imprint is everywhere. But the long-term…
articles.content:

articles.author: Olesya Dmitracova
articles.title: DHL will restart global shipments of over $800 to US consumers - CNN
articles.description: DHL will resume global shipments from businesses to American consumers worth more than $800 after a suspension earlier this month, the company said Monday.
articles.content:
DHL will resume global shipments from businesses to American consumers worth more than $800 after a suspension earlier this month, the company said Monday.
